column1: what (question particle used in front of nouns)
to eat; to take; to reach for something
very well, okay (a response denoting agreement)
cord used to hold a headdress in place
to arrive, to reach a destination
to bathe, to take a bath or shower
by God, I swear, really (used to add emphasis)
lightly salted, partially dehydrated yogurt with olive oil
feast of breaking the Ramadan fast
to use, to utilize, to employ
to be wounded, to be hurt
to acquire, to obtain, to get
to tell a story; to talk
to request, to order (e.g. in a restaurant)
to introduce someone to someone else
to be sent into exile, to be expelled
